name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

lessons.name: Propellant Chemistry
lessons.description: Chemical composition and reactions of rocket propellants.

lessons.name: Thrust Vector Control
lessons.description: Methods and technologies for controlling rocket thrust vector.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

lessons.name: Thermal Analysis of Propulsion Systems
lessons.description: Analyzing thermal effects on rocket propulsion systems.

lessons.name: Green Propulsion Technologies
lessons.description: Exploring environmentally friendly rocket propulsion alternatives.

lessons.description: Application of CFD in the design and analysis of rocket nozzles.

lessons.description: Cutting-edge methods for thrust vector control in rocket engines.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Basic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to the fundamental principles of aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Incompressible Flow
lessons.description: Understanding the behavior of fluids under incompressible conditions.

lessons.name: Compressible Flow
lessons.description: Exploring aerodynamic phenomena in compressible flow regimes.

lessons.name: Hypersonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Studying aerodynamics at high speeds beyond Mach 5.

lessons.name: Experimental Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Practical aspects and techniques in experimental aerodynamics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Analysis of aerodynamics at speeds below the speed of sound.

lessons.name: Supersonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Exploring aerodynamics at speeds beyond the speed of sound.

lessons.name: Transonic Flow
lessons.description: Study of aerodynamics in the transition between subsonic and supersonic speeds.

lessons.name: Shock Waves and Expansion Fans
lessons.description: Understanding the phenomena of shock waves and expansion fans in aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Wing Design
lessons.description: Principles and considerations in designing aerodynamic wings.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in Aerospace
lessons.description: Fundamental concepts of heat transfer in aerospace applications.

lessons.name: Ablative Heat Shield Technologies
lessons.description: Exploring ablative materials and technologies for thermal protection.

lessons.name: Thermal Analysis of Spacecraft Reentry
lessons.description: Analyzing thermal effects during spacecraft reentry into the Earth's atmosphere.

lessons.name: Radiative Cooling Techniques
lessons.description: Utilizing radiative cooling methods to manage spacecraft temperatures.

lessons.name: Hypersonic Thermal Protection
lessons.description: Developing thermal protection for hypersonic flight conditions.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Materials in Aerospace
lessons.description: Selection and characteristics of materials used in spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis Techniques
lessons.description: Methods for analyzing and testing spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Load Distribution and Stress Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding how loads are distributed and analyzing stress in spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Frame and Panel Design
lessons.description: Designing spacecraft structures using frame and panel configurations.

lessons.name: Advanced Composite Materials in Spacecraft
lessons.description: Applications and benefits of advanced composite materials in spacecraft design.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Keplerian Orbits
lessons.description: Study of orbits based on Kepler's laws of planetary motion.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers and Transfers
lessons.description: Techniques for spacecraft orbital maneuvers and interplanetary transfers.

lessons.name: Gravity-Assist Trajectories
lessons.description: Utilizing gravitational assists for spacecraft trajectory optimization.

lessons.name: Celestial Mechanics
lessons.description: Understanding the gravitational interactions between celestial bodies.

lessons.name: Orbital Debris Management
lessons.description: Strategies for managing and mitigating orbital debris in space.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Systems Engineering Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles and processes of spacecraft systems engineering.

lessons.name: Power and Energy Systems
lessons.description: Design and management of spacecraft power and energy systems.

lessons.name: Communication Systems in Spacecraft
lessons.description: Communication technologies and systems used in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Guidance, Navigation, and Control Systems
lessons.description: Implementing systems for spacecraft guidance, navigation, and control.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Environmental Control Systems
lessons.description: Managing spacecraft environments for crewed and uncrewed missions.
